title.rendered: Bembridge Airport in Bembridge, Isle of Wight, UK

content.rendered:
Bembridge Airport in Bembridge, Isle of Wight, UK Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address: Sandown Road
Bembridge
Isle of Wight, PO35 5PW
Latitude 50 40 41 N, Longitude1 6 34 W

Phone: 01983 873051

Email id: Grahamleach3@tesco.net

Hours: 09:30-16:30 BST, 10:00-15:30 GMT

  Bembridge Airport Official website: http://www.vectisglidingclub.co.uk/

Direction: View direction here

IATA code: BBP

ICAO code: EGHJ
